name: OrganismsTestsForNucleicAcidInExtrapulmonarySpecimen
title: Organisms (Tests for Nucleic Acid in Extrapulmonary Specimen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of organisms in Extrapulmonary Specimens by Nucleic Acid Testing.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: bacteria, virus, fungus, culture),(Exclusion Criteria: none.)
